point of this question? Does it implicitly involve an ad hominem fallacy?
2.  In the biblical story of Job, Job is described as a person who “was
blameless and upright, one who feared God and turned away from evil”
(Job 1:1). Satan challenges God to allow him to subject Job to the worst
